name: King Slime Stroll
description:
Made for Slime Jam in 5 days. 

Controls are z for green slime, x for red slime and c for blue slime. Each slime will remove the obstacle that shares its color. You have 10 heart points and will lose one every time you match up a slime incorrectly or run into an obstacle with the king. This game isn't very long, if you do not fail it is only a bit over a minute to complete.

Developed by Neko (programming) and Muffy (art), using music by Louie Zong
